summary: In Baghdad in the early 1900's, a young woman rises up through the ranks of power within the Ottoman Empire. She and a eunuch plan an elaborate scheme for the release of the female slaves.
cast: Marie Gillain|Alex Descas|Lucia Bosè|Valeria Golino|Malick Bowens|Christophe Aquillon|Serra Yilmaz|Haluk Bilginer|Pelin Batu|Ayla Algan|Nilüfer Açikalin|Meriç Benlioglu|Cansel Elcin|Basak Köklükaya|Felicitè Mbezelè|Gaia Narcisi|Meltem Savci|Selda Özer
title: El último harén
